about_the_game:
Seeker's Alliance is a fast-paced Trading Card Game (TCG) where players choose Hero Units from one of three powerful Factions to build decks and embark on an epic adventure across a vast island. As they face off against other players and complete challenges posed by the island's Ruler, players must hunt down the 100 elusive Bounty Cards scattered across the land to become the island's next Ruler.

Each with their own goals and desires, fighting by your side are Heroes from three different Factions, including: 

Van der Leck Family

The Van der Leck Family is a rising star in the Sea of Data. Members are impulsive, young, and ambitious, yet possess the cold ruthlessness and wisdom to see the big picture.

House Galahad
Members of House Galahad are skilled hackers, relentless dreamers, and the fearless pioneers who first ventured into the new world.

Mahdia Alliance
Mahdia Alliance is the guardian of ancient virtues, where blazing dragon flames accompany philosophers. It serves as the beacon that illuminates the path for all amidst the chaos of this new world.

In Seeker's Alliance, players strategically deploy cards across three Zones: Attack, Speed, and Defense. Each card has its designated Zone, and outcomes in these Zones will determine the course of the game.

Brute force isn’t the only path to victory. Heroes skilled in guerrilla tactics can seize an advantage by winning the Speed Zone, while slow, heavy units can establish a strong defense in the Defense Zone and use counter-attacks to devastate opponents. Of course, if you’d rather overwhelm your opponents with sheer power, you can prove once and for all that all strategies crumble when faced with absolute power.

Each Hero in the game comes equipped with their unique ultimate skill, not only offering powerful, game-changing effects but also showcasing the Hero's charm with customized animations. Whether it's a cunning strategy to turn the tides or the strongest shield that stops all damage, these ults will be the key to your victory.

■ True TCG: Collect cards and trade with your friends through the marketplace.

■ Monthly Ladder: Build your deck, challenge top players on the ladder, and win exclusive rare cards available only for that month.

■ Hero Arena: No deck-building required—select a Hero and their preset deck for a fair competition against other players.

■ Boss Raids: Defeat bosses with unique abilities to earn powerful cards.

■ The fate of the world Is in your hands: The outcomes of player battles will determine the fate of the three Factions, as well as which new cards will be released!
